title: [CLS] Ethereum Magicians Infinite Endgames: Ethconomics
description:
Once again, Devcon will host Ethereum Magicians gatherings for the community to come together and discuss the most important topics in Ethereum's roadmap. Join us here to discuss the "infinite endgame" for Ethereum's economic model. We'll cover the role of Ether in the network's security, issuance proposals, out-of-protocol economic influences, and more! 

For more context, see: https://bit.ly/ethmag-sea
